heroTitle: place where nature takes your first steps
hotel_description1: is located in a magical corner of nature, near by picturesque beach and mountains. Here you are you can enjoy fresh mountain air and incredible views right from the window of your room.
gallery_description: Our gallery showcases the stunning beauty of Barakat, highlighting the unforgettable experiences and breathtaking views that await you.
restaurant_description: Our restaurant combines the best recipes of European cuisine and local culinary traditions.
lake_view: A special view of the space framed by the water of the lake opens up through the glass wall.
cozy_rooms_description: has 18 cozy and spacious rooms with incredible panoramas that take your breath away.
hotel_description2: Barakat Hotel is a mini-hotel in the city of Ureki, located 100 meters from the popular Ureki Beach. The hotel features a restaurant, bar, and free private parking. Guests can take advantage of the 24-hour front desk, airport shuttle service, and food and beverage delivery, as well as free Wi-Fi throughout the property.
hotel_description3: All rooms at Barakat Hotel have a wardrobe. Guests are provided with bed linen and towels.
hotel_description4: A variety of breakfast options are available, including a menu-based breakfast, full English/Irish breakfast, or American breakfast.
hotel_description5: Barakat Hotel is situated 29 km from Kobuleti Train Station and 34 km from Petra Fortress. Batumi International Airport is 59 km away.
